video.title: Highway Thru Hell
video.synopsis: On the hazardous highways of Canada's interior, heavy vehicle towing companies experience hardship and triumph rescuing wrecked and stranded trucks.

episodes.synopsis: A blizzard causes a multi-car accident as Adam and Kevin struggle to clear the highway, and Jamie takes his son to a nighttime wreck of five semis.
episodes.title: Death on the Coq

episodes.synopsis: When they lack the necessary equipment to clear a load of spilled lumber, Jamie's crew asks what happened to the heavy truck they ordered a year ago.
episodes.title: Where’s My Rotator?

episodes.synopsis: Jamie's son spends his first check on an ear piercing, Kevin shows up without equipment and the new Rotator causes problems on its first run.
episodes.title: It’s Stormy Everywhere

episodes.synopsis: When his new driver turns out to be unreliable, Jamie must rely on a pick-up crew to respond to a fatal reefer truck crash.
episodes.title: Roughing Up the Rookie

episodes.synopsis: Jamie's rivalry with a competitor heats up when the Rotator needs repairs and one of his new drivers starts to have second thoughts about the job.
episodes.title: No Tears in Towing

episodes.synopsis: A heavy snowfall causes risk of avalanche and the Coq is closed, forcing Jamie's team to take back roads to rescue a semi that drove off a cliff.
episodes.title: The Avalanche Zone

episodes.synopsis: Kevin gets a video camera to film wrecks, but his new hobby causes problems. A day navigating the Coq in avalanche conditions redirects his focus.
episodes.title: Family Business

episodes.synopsis: Spring means big headaches: bills, short tempers, Brandon's case of spring fever -- and enough wrecks to keep Jamie's crew busy.
episodes.title: Yin & Yang

episodes.synopsis: The crew must pull a crashed SUV up a 400-meter cliff, their toughest job of the season. Meanwhile, Jamie tries to teach Brandon to drive a tow truck.
episodes.title: I Can't Take It Anymore!

episodes.synopsis: In this retrospective, the Heavy Rescue crew looks back on the season's best and worst moments: wrecks, weather and personal disagreements.
episodes.title: After the Crash

episodes.synopsis: Winter brings Jamie a tough assignment to right a good client's new semi without causing more damage to the vehicle and its cargo of lumber.
episodes.title: Welcome to Winter

episodes.synopsis: The crew grapples with a miserable winter, a wrecked load of wood chips and a heavy Sea-Can container that puts a strain on Jamie and the Rotator.
episodes.title: Deadlift

episodes.synopsis: Jamie convinces veteran driver and old friend Scott to rejoin the team, but Scott's truck isn't as promised. Meanwhile, Adam is pushed past his limit.
episodes.title: The Comeback Kid

episodes.synopsis: Jamie and Adam's relationship is tested during a treacherous rescue, while Ken does everything he can to save a stranded truckload of Christmas mail.
episodes.title: Two Guys, Two Trucks

episodes.synopsis: The team faces challenges with rescues and personnel when Rob's license is revoked for speeding and 65-year-old Bruce is starting to show his age.
episodes.title: Sometimes the Patient Dies

episodes.synopsis: A flaming truckload of cat food gives Scott and Gord one of their most dangerous rescues. Doug gets into a fight while Jamie fights off competition.
episodes.title: Still Got It

episodes.synopsis: Winter's fury is worsened by unexpected problems. Jamie's license has expired, the Rotator is in trouble and a new job is as tough as they come.
episodes.title: Crazy Horse

episodes.synopsis: A violent crash blocks the Coq highway's most important exit. Tension erupts between Scott and Jamie over the old truck, and a new driver arrives.
episodes.title: Suck It Up Princess

episodes.synopsis: Heavy spring rain and a damaged trailer full of plastic beads give the team grief. A wrecked truck is dangerously close to falling onto a rail line.
episodes.title: Over the Edge

episodes.synopsis: Ingenuity is tested in the rescue of an apple truck from a dangerous bridge. The crew deals with the aftermath of a deadly multivehicle accident.
episodes.title: The Insects Unlisted in the Encyclopedia

episodes.synopsis: Jamie and the crew pull off one of their cleverest rescues on Highway 1. A new competitor makes Jamie realize the road ahead is going to be rough.
episodes.title: Cut in Half

episodes.synopsis: Jamie and the team throw back a few beers and reminisce about the events of Season 2, including their top five rescues.
episodes.title: Beer O'Clock

episodes.synopsis: Jamie's business is threatened by a financially disastrous rescue and an aggressive competitor, forcing him to make a decision: face ruin or move on.
episodes.title: Closure is Not An Option
